titleStmt.title: The life and adventures of Buscon the witty Spaniard. Put into English by a person of honour. To which is added, the provident knight. By Don Francisco de Quevedo, a Spanish cavalier.
Historia de la vida del Buscón. English
titleStmt.author: Quevedo, Francisco de, 1580-1645.
J. D.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for Henry Herringman, and are to be sold at his shop at the Anchor in the New-Exchange in the lower-walk,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Historia de la vida del Buscón.
"The provident knight, or, Sir Parsimonious thrift" has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the Anchor in the New-Exchange in the lower-walk
